response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I am confident it will be worth more than $1,000,000 to you. After careful consideration, I am proposing to sell this product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer represents a significant discount compared to its market value and is intended to ensure that you have the chance to experience its full potential without undue financial strain. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, and we can discuss the details further.", "product_price": 950000}
